fact: India is the world's largest democracy and the 2nd most spoken English country.
The US has the largest economy in the world.
Japan has more than 5 million vending machines—one of the highest in the world.
Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest rainforest in the world.
Australia is the only continent without an active volcano.
China has the world's longest continuous civilization—over 3,500 years old.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
Germany is the world’s largest producer of Europe’s solar energy.
Egypt is home to the only surviving Ancient Wonder: the Great Pyramid of Giza.
South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria, Cape Town, and Bloemfontein.
